parameter.name: WebApiContta-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: WebApiContta Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: server=complexwork.cloudapp.net;User Id=contta;password=Pegazus;Persist Security Info=True;database=contta; convert zero datetime=True

parameter.name: WebApiContta.Data.Context.ApiDbContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: WebApiContta.Data.Context.ApiDbContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
